channel.title: 459 look a like | By Chosen Pkz
channel.description:
Hey guys, i really thrive off the 459 style. For this project i wanted to make a 459 look a like! My prefered base would be either Porject Insanity, or Battlescape. Why? Because i have yet to come across a 459 look a like with a good combat system. I wan't this project to blow other look a likes away. I need a good client developer to know what he is doing with side icons etc. So if you guys want in, and believe in what i am saying. Please contact me, or fill out an application below.
Thanks, Samuel.
[b]Positions in need.[/b] 1)Client Developers. 2)Server Developers. (I plan to be this position). 3)Hoster (Possibly taken). 4)Website Designer (SMF, or Vbulletin).
[i][size=8pt][b]Note:[/b] I really want this project to succeed so we can have more then one person per position.[/size][/i]
[b]Format.[/b] [code]Your desired position (One of the following above): Years or Months of programmer and or desinging experience: What is your profession: Why should we pick you: Age: Time Zone: Contact information: Extra:[/code]
[i][size=8pt][b]Note:[/b] I am not asking for a team do all the work while i sit aside, i will be doing just as much, if not more work in this project then anyone else. [/size][/i]

item.title: 459 look a like | By Chosen Pkz
item.dc:creator: @Chosen_Pkz Chosen Pkz
item.description:
@Chosen_Pkz wrote:

[quote=“Amayzing, post:4, topic:345116”]Your desired position (One of the following above): Website Designer
Years or months of programming and or designing experience: I’ve been in the website development “scene” for two years now.
What is your profession?: I’m a website developer in the making.
Why should we pick you?: I possess large amounts of knowledge when it comes to managing a communities’ website and I’m able to build professional looking websites and or forums.
Age: 15
Time Zone: Mountain Time
Contact information: MSN: 1337@beastly-tech.com
Extra: :)[/quote]
Accepeted. Add my Msn - Graff_is_art@hotmail.com

Read full topic
